summary: A ex-dancer has a heart problem and even with a transplant, he may still only have a few months to live. Time's spent looking at people/life in Paris from his balcony. His single mom sister moves in with her 3 kids to look after him.
cast: Fabrice Luchini|Romain Duris|Joffrey Platel|Mélanie Laurent|Karin Viard|Albert Dupontel|Zinedine Soualem|Annelise Hesme|Audrey Marnay|Xavier Robic|Farida Khelfa|Suzanne Von Aichinger|Marco Prince|François Cluzet|Juliette Binoche|Marie Drion|Iris Grillet|Arthur Dujardin|Kingsley Kum Abang|Hubert Saint-Macary|Lila Perrin-Orsini|Renée Le Calm|Lorenzo Larocca|Frédéric Rose|Judith El Zein|Frédéric Cuif|Alexia Doucet|Julie Ferrier|Gilles Lellouche|Emmanuel Quatra|Georges Happy|Audrey Lamy|Jeanne Candel|Anne Benoît|Nelly Antignac|Juliette Navis|Jean-Pierre Moulin|Samuel Achache|Sabrina Ouazani|Lucciana de Vogüe|Sandy Boizard|Jérôme Michaud de la Rivière|Catherine Pello|Maurice Bénichou|Chloé Grillert|Pablo Klapisch|Thaïs Klapisch|Julia Urtado|Samuel Urtado|Juliette Prier|Paolo Coccina|Daniel Delannoy|Jean-Jacques Cirillo|Jeanne Cellard|Amine Naji|Charlotte Corman|Gérard Dufraisse|Jérémy Bardeau|Olivia Bonamy|Joseph Malerba|Jérémie Delaboudinière|Cédric Klapisch|Sabrina Seyvecou

title: París
